content:
Yesterday I was going around showing my website and @Philip Durbin & @Dan suggested that I should upload it on Zulip. In the process, we thought it might be fun to have a whole topic for sharing personal websites
so here it is!

Iâ€™ll go first:
https://tanmayspace.pages.dev/

Would love to see what others have built!
My website isn't interesting. My deploy scripts and configs may be somewhat interesting though. Maybe I could make that public.

I spin up a new linode, run a couple scripts from here (have to enter my root password a couple times), swap IP addresses with my old one, reboot it, and it's up. Linode has an API, I could maybe even automate some of the spinups and shutdowns and IP swap stuff in the future.
I guess your blog isn't in the source?
4 messages were moved from this topic to #boston > HTTPS everywhere, even Phil's site by Philip Durbin.
